message: Let's split it fairly, 60-40 is a good starting point.
You wanted 60, I'll give you 20, now it's your turn to be generous!
I'll give you a bigger share this time, 40-60 is a more generous offer.
You're trying to get back to 60-40, but I'm not falling for it. I'll give you a tiny share this time, but I'm not budging!
I'll give you a bigger share, but I need something more than 10. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting desperate, and I'm getting greedy! I'll take a big chunk, but I'll give you just enough to keep you going... for now.
I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to give up completely. Let's try to find a compromise.
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience! I'll take almost all the money, but I'll give you a tiny crumb.
I'll give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to give up completely. This is my final offer.
You're almost out of time, and I'm almost out of patience! I'll take almost all the money, and you'll get a tiny fraction. It's now or never!
I'm out of time and out of options. I'll accept the worst-case scenario and give you the entire $100.
